title: Did Franken Fotog say that the Grubbing photo was organized?
subtitle: A false quote by the photographer who took a notorious picture of Senator Al Franken and Lian Tuyden was circulated in November 2017.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The photographer of Al Franken's notorious photo said that the moment was organized, that Leanne Toddine was "playing the role of the dead," and that she wanted him to "save her."
